agent.name: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Preservation copy: Document, appointing James S. Chambers as the Navy agent for the Port of Philadelphia

mods.mods:note: Printed document with manuscript inserts, appointing James S. Chambers as the Navy agent for the Port of Philadelphia. Signed by Abraham Lincoln as President of the United States and Gideon Welles as Secretary of the Navy. Formerly Ind. Ms.
The digital surrogate of this document is stored off-line. Please see staff for assistance.
This digital object is located at http://gwspec-digcol1.wrlc.org/Drobo5Volume1/ms2135/preservation/ as of 2018-10-17.
This document was scanned by the Abraham Lincoln papers project staff. The digital objects were added to the lincoln papers project in 2010.
Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University, 2130 H Street NW, Washington, 20052, United States of America (https://library.gwu.edu/scrc/contact)
